content: Hi Alex! I saw you're interested in learning Italian cooking. I'd love to teach you some family recipes!
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to learn how to make fresh pasta. When would be a good time for you?
How about this Saturday at 2 PM? We can do it at my place - I have all the equipment we'll need.
Perfect! Should I bring anything specific?
Hey! Ready for your guitar lesson tomorrow? I've prepared some easy songs we can start with.
